name: Common
description: The most widely spoken language across the realms.

name: Elvish
description: The melodic language of the elves.

name: Dwarvish
description: A guttural language rich with history and tradition.

name: Draconic
description: The ancient tongue of dragons and dragonborn.

name: Orc
description: A harsh, brutal language used by orcs.

name: Halfling
description: A cheerful dialect spoken by halflings.

name: Gnomish
description: A language full of technical nuance, used by gnomes.

name: Giant
description: The booming tongue of giants and ogres.

name: Sylvan
description: The language of the Feywild, spoken by fey creatures.

name: Abyssal
description: The language of demons and the Abyss.

name: Celestial
description: The divine language of celestial beings.

name: Infernal
description: The language of devils and the Nine Hells.

name: Primordial
description: The elemental language of air, earth, fire, and water.
